https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte._instruction: Add the content type that can be defined by the regular expression of this content type pattern (e.g., for file extensions).

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/conte.name: contentType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this content type pattern that may help you to find this instance more easily.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/regex._instruction: Enter the regular expression for common elements within the file names (including their file path and/or extension) of the files formatted using the stated 'contentType'.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/regex.label: Regex
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/regex.name: regex
